New_Britain.WVIT: WVIT, virtual channel 30 (UHF digital channel 35), branded on-air as NBC Connecticut or NBC CT, is an NBC owned-and-operated television station licensed to New Britain, Connecticut and serving the Hartford–New Haven television market. The station is owned by the NBC Owned Television Stations subsidiary of NBCUniversal and is a sister station to Hartford-licensed low-powered, Class A WRDM-CD (channel 50). The two stations share studios on New Britain Avenue in West Hartford; WVIT's transmitter is located on Rattlesnake Mountain in Farmington, Connecticut.
